#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,backup,ans;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ans=0;
        cin>>n;
        backup=n;
        while(n!=0)
        {
            ans+=n%10;
            n/=10;
        }
        ans=backup%ans;
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
